content: This is a somewhat longer PR (600 lines). I think these "shapes" are finally getting into good shape. It seems to be non-trivial to get this right. Thanks Scott for all these iterated efforts. I invite people with experience in formalisation of category theory to review this. @Reid Barton @Floris van Doorn @Jesse Michael Han @Jakob von Raumer
In particular if people could look at the tutorial for examples of intended usage that would be great.
